TopicTitle: Auto-Shift State on Breaking Ground Parts

Articles.Content: I just noticed this last night.  What is the auto-shift state doing?  And for that matter, what is On Power Loss doing?

On power loss means what it will do if the craft runs out of power- will the motor/hinge/piston/etc. lock in place or still move freely. 

I haven't used the robotic parts all that much, but the auto shift state looks like it will set the part to automatically shut down if you get below a specific power level and start up again when you go above another specific power level- if something uses a lot of power then making it shut down with low power or only start up again with a lot of power in reserve could help eke out your battery life a bit longer.
